label: Object Definitions Examples
description: These are examples where the definition is further qualified by providing the type of object the property applies to

fields.name: engine_power
fields.label: Engine Power
fields.description: Mechanical power produced by the engine

fields.name: batt_power
fields.label: Battery Power
fields.description: Electrical power available from the battery

fields.name: engine_temp
fields.label: Engine Temperature
fields.description: Temperature of the engine measured on the cylinder head

fields.name: combustion_temp
fields.label: Combustion Temperature
fields.description: Temperature of the engine measured in the combustion chamber

fields.name: cabin_temp
fields.label: Cabin Temperature
fields.description: Temperature of the air inside the cabin

fields.name: outdoor_temp
fields.label: Outdoor Temperature
fields.description: Temperature of the air outside the vehicle

fields.name: water_temp
fields.label: Seawater Temperature
fields.description: Temperature of the seawater close to the surface
